title: The Surrey, A Corinthia Hotel is now open
lead: The Surrey, A Corinthia Hotel opens on New York City's Upper East Side. Under the stewardship of Corinthia Hotels, the new hotel brings vibrant energy to 76th and Madison.

title: Bookings are now open in New York

title: Corinthia Bucharest announces partnership with renowned restaurant Sass’ Café
lead: Corinthia Bucharest announces a joint venture with legendary Monaco hotspot SASS’ Café, operated by EYE Management company, set to open in the Romanian capital in early 2025.

title: Corinthia Hotels announces Rome development

title: Corinthia Hotels announces new hotel in Doha, Qatar
lead: Corinthia Hotels has signed an agreement with United Development Company (UDC), a leading Qatari public shareholding company and the master developer of The Pearl-Qatar and Gewan Island, to manage and operate a luxury Corinthia hotel to be built in UDC’s newest flagship real estate development, Gewan Island.
